venue.name: Sons of Italy Quincy Hall Rental

item.description:
Annual Food Drive Party featuring The World Premier Band!

This is a cross-posted event with Boston Providence Single Parents Group.  It's also posted in  a few other Meet-up groups.  It's a great time, for a great cause!

Join us once again for a great cause and a fun night of dancing to the The World Premier Band. Each year we collect and donate non-perishable items for "The St.Joseph's food pantry". Last year over 400 people attended and brought thousands of dollars worth of food for those in need!!  New this year - additional 150 capacity room downstairs with another DJ!!

Ticket Information - UPDATED 3/27

  • By Paypal - Log in and send payment to: perryp21t@comcast.net - HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
  • By Phone -  Call Perry at: 781-963-2691 or 781-492-5349 to reserve your ticket in advance (Sold out in advance last year )!  Please mention you are with Sandy's meetup group.  

This event sells out every year, so there is a high probability that you won't be able to get tickets if you attempt to purchase them at the door.

Cost is $20/pp and includes hot & cold appetizers, dessert and coffee.   DJ between sets.  Proper dress required.  

 Check out World Premier Band on Youtube!  

Directions

Don't forget to bring a non-perishable food item to donate!

To stay up to date on the latest with this event, like the organizer's facebook page here:

https://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Perry-Project/189829397791903
item.how_to_find_us: Most likely will have a BPSP sign.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Food Drive Fundraiser/Dancing to "World Premier Band" - Quincy (Adults)
